name: Brotherhood (thenerdpoint60, Quadratic Games)
description:
This is the tale of the Wing and Hammer brother's.
Once upon a time... And now it's the time. You appeared somewhere and your brother attached to you. Why??

Controls
Tapping W - Flapping wings
Holding W - Gliding
A/ D - Move with the Wing Brother
RShift - Add Distance Between the Brothers
RCtrl - Remove Distance Between the Brothers
Space - Dash The Hammer Brother
Left/Right Arrow - Move the Hammer Brother
Up Arrow - A small Jump for Hammer Brother
R - Restart The Game

Warning! If you are playing the game in browser, don't press Ctrl and W together, it will probably close your browser.
